show-empty-positions.label: Show {{count}} empty positions
show-empty-positions.tooltip: Positions valued at $0 are hidden by default. Toggle 'Show Empty Positions' to view or use them. You still own these and can utilize them without incurring new position costs.

explore-banner: You have ${{amount}} of assets available to be put to work on Summer.fi

details-tooltips.netValue: Net Value is the current value of the collateral in your position minus the current debt expressed in USD.
details-tooltips.netValueEarnActivePassive: Net Value is the total of your initial deposit, plus earnings or additional deposits, minus fees.
details-tooltips.liquidationPrice: The current price of the collateral, based on the LTV of the position, that, if crossed, would liquidate your position.
details-tooltips.ltv: The LTV is the Loan to Value of your position, and represents the amount of debt you have, relative to your collateral, as a %. The LTV is used to determine your liquidation price, often expressed as Max LTV.
details-tooltips.multiple: Multiple indicates how much additional collateral exposure you have in this position, affecting potential gains and losses.
details-tooltips.borrowRate: Percentage reflecting Borrow (debt) APY minus Supply (collateral) APY. Positive values mean you are paying to borrow; negative means you're earning. Rates are variable.
details-tooltips.lendingRange: The range reflecting the price you’ve selected to lend your tokens, based on the existing distribution of price buckets.
details-tooltips.apy: Annualised rate this position is currently earning
details-tooltips.earnings: The earnings show the additional amount earned by substracting your cumulative deposits and withdrawals from your current net value. Note: This can be negative for positions with a higher borrow rate than the collateral yield
details-tooltips.90dApy: The Annualised rate the position is earning based on the average of the last 90 days
details-tooltips.suppliedTokenBalance: The total amount of your supplied asset(s), expressed in {{symbol}}.
details-tooltips.borrowedTokenBalance: The total amount of your borrowed asset(s), expressed in {{symbol}}.

non-owner-notice.header: You are viewing the wallet of {{address}}
non-owner-notice.connected-assets: You have ${{amount}} worth of reasons to open a position on summer.fi
non-owner-notice.disconnected-assets: They have ${{amount}} worth of reasons to open a position on summer.fi. Connect your wallet to see what positions you could open
non-owner-notice.disconnected-no-assets: Connect your wallet to see what positions you could open

empty-states.no-positions: There are no positions for this wallet.
empty-states.no-positions-error: There was an error trying to load positions for this wallet
empty-states.no-filtered-positions: There are no positions matching your filters.
empty-states.no-assets: There are no assets in this wallet.

ajna-warning: There has been possible griefing attack vector identified on Ajna Protocol. All Ajna users should close their positions and withdraw their funds. This is not related to any summer.fi contracts, so Maker and Aave users are not affected.

banner.lowerLiquidationPrice: Your position #{{id}} can get refinanced to lower your liquidation price by {{value}}
